channel.title: Aluminum on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Aluminum on funPlantGenes

item.title: AhFRDL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AhFRDL1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Arachis hypogaea Functional Descriptions: AhFRDL1-mediated citrate secretion contributes to adaptation to iron deficiency and aluminum stress in peanuts.

item.title: ART1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os12g07280 RAPdb gene ID: Os12g0170400 Gene Symbol: ART1 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: ASR5;OsAsr1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os11g06720 RAPdb gene ID: Os11g0167800 Gene Symbol: ASR5 OsAsr1 OsASR2 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: BnALMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnALMT1 Gene Name: Al-activated malate transporter1 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The BnALMT1 and BnALMT2 Genes from Rape Encode Aluminum-Activated Malate Transporters That Enhance the Aluminum Resistance of Plant Cells.

item.title: BnALMT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaA08g26970D Gene Symbol: BnALMT2 Gene Name: Al-activated malate transporter2 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The BnALMT1 and BnALMT2 Genes from Rape Encode Aluminum-Activated Malate Transporters That Enhance the Aluminum Resistance of Plant Cells.

item.title: BoMATE
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BoMATE Gene Name: aluminum activated citrate transporter Genome: Species: Brassica oleracea Functional Descriptions: Brassica oleracea MATE (BoMATE) Encodes a Citrate Transporter and Enhances Aluminum Tolerance in Arabidopsis thaliana.

item.title: CcSTOP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CcSTOP1 Gene Name: SENSITIVE TO PROTON RHIZOTOXICITY1 Genome: Species: Cajanus cajan Functional Descriptions: Characterization of CcSTOP1| a C2H2-type transcription factor regulates Al tolerance gene in pigeonpea.

item.title: Docs1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os02g14120 RAPdb gene ID: Os02g0236100 Gene Symbol: Docs1 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: EAD1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb250340 Gene Symbol: EAD1 Gene Name: ear apical degeneration1 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: HvHOX9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvHOX9 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Our findings suggest that miR166b/HvHOX9 play a critical role in Al tolerance by decreasing root cell wall Al binding and increasing apoplastic pH for Al detoxification in the root.

item.title: LjPCS3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjPCS3 Gene Name: phytochelatin synthase PCS3-7N Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: Functional Characterization of an Unusual Phytochelatin Synthase, LjPCS3, of Lotus japonicus.

item.title: MdCIbHLH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000662999 Gene Symbol: MdCIbHLH1 Gene Name: Malus domestica Cold-induced bHLH1 Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: MdMYB73
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000894463 Gene Symbol: MdMYB73 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 73 Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MsDHN1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MsDHN1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago sativa Functional Descriptions: These results indicate that MsDHN1 can increase alfalfa tolerance to Al stress via increasing oxalate secretion from root tips, which may involve in the interaction of MsDHN1 with two AQP.

item.title: MsLEA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MS.gene058705 Gene Symbol: MsLEA1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago sativa Functional Descriptions: These results indicate that MsLEA1 recruits and protects its target proteins (SOD and Ms1770) and increases alfalfa tolerance against drought and Al stresses.

item.title: Nrat1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os02g03900 RAPdb gene ID: Os02g0131800 Gene Symbol: Nrat1 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: OsNIP1;2
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g10600 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0202800 Gene Symbol: OsNIP1 2 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: SbMATE
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sb03g043890 Gene Symbol: SbMATE Gene Name: multi-drug and toxic compound extrusion Genome: Species: Sorghum bicolor Functional Descriptions: Sugarcane plants constitutively overexpressing the Sorghum bicolor MATE gene (SbMATE) showed improved tolerance to Al when compared to non-transgenic (NT) plants, characterized by sustained root growth and exclusion of aluminum from the root apex based on the result obtained with hematoxylin staining.

item.title: SlALMT4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlALMT4 Gene Name: aluminum-activated malate transporter 4 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Two Members of the Aluminum-Activated Malate Transporter Family, SlALMT4 and SlALMT5, are Expressed during Fruit Development, and the Overexpression of SlALMT5 Alters Organic Acid Contents in Seeds in Tomato.

item.title: SlALMT5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlALMT5 Gene Name: aluminum-activated malate transporter 5 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Two Members of the Aluminum-Activated Malate Transporter Family, SlALMT4 and SlALMT5, are Expressed during Fruit Development, and the Overexpression of SlALMT5 Alters Organic Acid Contents in Seeds in Tomato.

item.title: TaALMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaALMT1 Gene Name: aluminium-activated malate transporter 1 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Role of TaALMT1 malate-GABA transporter in alkaline pH tolerance of wheat.

item.title: TaMATE1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaMATE1B Gene Name: multidrug and toxic compound extrusion Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Transposon-Mediated Alteration of TaMATE1B Expression in Wheat Confers Constitutive Citrate Efflux from Root Apices.

item.title: ZjALMT4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zj.jz000565069 Gene Symbol: ZjALMT4 Gene Name: Aluminum-Dependent Malate Transporter 4 Genome: Species: Ziziphus jujuba Functional Descriptions: Transcriptome sequencing analysis showed that the expression level of Aluminum-Dependent Malate Transporter 4 (ZjALMT4) was substantially higher in sour jujube than in jujube.
